name: Awoke
description: What is the project about? The project is about an anti-woke ideology and movement. The project is powered by $AWOKE and has a reply bot on Twitter that replies to a curated list of people and exclaims the AWOKE (Anti-Woke) ideology, the bot also has a reply feature. The token empowers free speech, one of the key virtues of cryptocurrency. What makes your project unique? The project is unique in the sense that it's one of the few projects that actually has a core ideology that they stand behind and revolve around. Another unique thing is the reply bot, there aren't many other cryptocurrency project that have a Twitter bot. History of your project. 10-15/06/2023 Project preparation 16/06/2023 Launch 01/07/2023 Onboarding of influencers and KOLs Whatâ€™s next for your project? The project will double down on its marketing and spread the AWOKE message further by getting billboards, partnerships etc... The project will also use $5000 of their own funds to upgrade the Twitter API so the bot can handle more load. A custom integration of the bot into Telegram is also coming. Awoke will launch a media campaign on Twitter while partnering with multiple KOLs to get its word out. What can your token be used for? The token can be used to gain access to unlimited bot queries as well as a way to be a community member.
